params.sqlcmd: "SELECT " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"PLANT_CD\\" AS \\"PLANT_CD\\", " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_STS_TYP\\" AS \\"JOB_ODR_STS_TYP\\", " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_TYP\\" AS \\"JOB_ODR_TYP\\", " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"PLAN_TYP\\" AS \\"PLAN_TYP\\", " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"ALC_GRP_CD\\" AS \\"ALC_GRP_CD\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS \\"JOB_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_QTY\\" AS \\"JOB_ODR_QTY\\", " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_DEL_FLG\\" AS \\"JOB_ODR_DEL_FLG\\" " +"FROM " +" T_JOB_ODR " +"WHERE " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_CANCEL_NO\\" = ?"

"select " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"OD_NO\\" as \\"OD_NO\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" as \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"ODR_STS_TYP\\" as \\"ODR_STS_TYP\\", " +" FNCGETFORMATTEDDATETIME(V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"DUE_DATE\\") as \\"DUE_DATE\\", " +" FNCGETFORMATTEDDATETIME(V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"ODR_START_DATE\\") as \\"ODR_START_DATE\\", " +" FNCGETFORMATTEDDATETIME(V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"PRD_DUE_DATE\\") as \\"PRD_DUE_DATE\\", " +" FNCGETFORMATTEDDATETIME(V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"PRD_START_DATE\\") as \\"PRD_START_DATE\\", " +" TO_CHAR(V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"ODR_QTY\\", 'FM999999999999999990.0999') as \\"ODR_QTY\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\" as \\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\", " +" TO_CHAR(V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"TOTAL_RCV_QTY\\", 'FM999999999999999990.0999') as \\"TOTAL_RCV_QTY\\", " +" FNCGETFORMATTEDDATETIME(V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"RCV_CMPLT_DATE\\") as \\"RCV_CMPLT_DATE\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"OD_GNR_TYP\\" as \\"OD_GNR_TYP\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"DM_STS_TYP\\" as \\"l_DM_STS_TYP\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"MRP_TYP\\" as \\"MRP_TYP\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"RLSD_PUCH_ODR_QTY\\" as \\"RLSD_PUCH_ODR_QTY\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"WORK_IN_PROC_QTY\\" as \\"WORK_IN_PROC_QTY\\" " +"from " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST " +"where " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" and V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"JOB_ODR_CANCEL_NO\\" = ? " +" and V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"OD_NO\\" = ? " +" and V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"PARENT_OD_NO\\" = ? " +" and V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +"order by " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"ITEM_CD\\""

"select " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"OD_NO\\" as \\"OD_NO\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" as \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"ODR_STS_TYP\\" as \\"ODR_STS_TYP\\", " +" FNCGETFORMATTEDDATETIME(V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"DUE_DATE\\") as \\"DUE_DATE\\", " +" FNCGETFORMATTEDDATETIME(V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"ODR_START_DATE\\") as \\"ODR_START_DATE\\", " +" FNCGETFORMATTEDDATETIME(V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"PRD_DUE_DATE\\") as \\"PRD_DUE_DATE\\", " +" FNCGETFORMATTEDDATETIME(V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"PRD_START_DATE\\") as \\"PRD_START_DATE\\", " +" TO_CHAR(V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"ODR_QTY\\", 'FM999999999999999990.0999') as \\"ODR_QTY\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\" as \\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\", " +" TO_CHAR(V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"TOTAL_RCV_QTY\\", 'FM999999999999999990.0999') as \\"TOTAL_RCV_QTY\\", " +" FNCGETFORMATTEDDATETIME(V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"RCV_CMPLT_DATE\\") as \\"RCV_CMPLT_DATE\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"OD_GNR_TYP\\" as \\"OD_GNR_TYP\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"DM_STS_TYP\\" as \\"l_DM_STS_TYP\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"MRP_TYP\\" as \\"MRP_TYP\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"RLSD_PUCH_ODR_QTY\\" as \\"RLSD_PUCH_ODR_QTY\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"WORK_IN_PROC_QTY\\" as \\"WORK_IN_PROC_QTY\\" " +"from " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST " +"where " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" and V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"JOB_ODR_CANCEL_NO\\" = ? " +" and V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"PARENT_OD_NO\\" is NULL " +" and V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +"order by " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"ITEM_CD\\""
